MINECRAFT BUILDSCozy Cabin
惬意小屋

Submitted by TonCZ
提供者：TonCZ

Nova Barlow


For your next weekend, how about a visit to this log cabin sent our way by TonCZ? Designed for maximum social distancing, this remote locale features a bicycle to explore the nearby trails, and lends a bit of additional atmosphere to the building. We probably shouldn’t ask about the skull above the doorway, but perhaps it’s just there to ward off wayward travelers. Only the builder of this cabin knows for sure!
下个周末来临时，不如拜访下这座由 TonCZ 提供的小木屋？木屋设计意在最大限度地保持社交距离，尚能骑上自行车去一探临近小道究竟，更为建筑添了些别致的氛围。也许我们不该过问木门上方的头颅意在何处，也许只是用来驱赶一些不速之客的。大概只有建筑者本人才知道原因吧！

Do you have a great build you’d like to show everyone? Feel free to send your screenshots (and a little information about your structure) to FeatureMe@minecraft.net and you may just see yours highlighted here!
你是否有想要分享给大家的绝赞建筑的想法？欢迎发送邮件将你的建筑的截图(与些许建筑的信息)至 FeatureMe@minecraft.net ，而后你的精美建筑也许就会出现在这里了！



【封徵 译自官网 2020 年 08 月 07 日发布的 Cozy Cabin；原作者 Nova Barlow】
【本文排版借助了：SPX】

replies.txt_content: 每次看到这种高解析度的作品就会有种“这也是mc做的？”的不真实感
